name: PVCMed Alliance
membership: PVCMed closely cooperates with the European Council of Vinyl Manufacturers (http://www.pvc.org/en/p/ecvm) and PlasticsEurope (https://www.plasticseurope.org/en) in areas of common interest
goal: PVCMed Alliance’s aim is to provide a focal point for communication with healthcare professionals and regulators about PVC-based healthcare applications, and their fundamental role in quality of healthcare, safety and cost-efficiency, all whilst being environmentally responsible.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Public Health
euInitiatives:
EU Plastics Strategy
Interface of Chemical, Product and Waste legislation
REACH Regulation
Waste Directives
Medical Devices Regulation
